page.title: 03Newquay's Tourism-Present
page.content:
Tourism is the main source of income for Newquay.It has many fine beaches,beautiful scenery and quaint villages-which attract people from all over the country.
Newquay is well known for surfing. The European Surfing Championships were held here in 1983.This proved to be so successful that it may become an annual event.
There are many gift shops,'rock shops',souvenir shops and cafes-a large proportion of which close for the winter.
In nearly every road can be found a guest house,hotel or youth hostel- 'hotel work' and 'shop work' provide a large number of seasonal jobs.
